title: Robin Trower 20 Century Blues 1994 Studio Album FLAC
description:
Robin Trower 20 Century Blues 1994 Studio Album FLAC

20th Century Blues is the fifteenth studio album by Robin Trower.
Released in 1994.

Track listing:
All songs written by Robin Trower, except "Reconsider Baby".

1. "20th Century Blues"     3:13 
2. "Prisoner of Love"     3:43 
3. "Precious Gift"     4:03 
4. "Whisper up a Storm"     4:02 
5. "Extermination Blues"     4:51 
6. "Step into the Dark"     6:08 
7. "Rise up Like the Sun"     3:05 
8. "Secret Place"     4:34 
9. "Chase the Bone"     3:20 
10. "Promise You the Stars"     3:38 
11. "Don't Lose Faith in Tomorrow"     5:40 
12. "Reconsider Baby"   Lowell Fulson 4:29 

Total Time = 50:33

Comments:
Holy cow! You fall out of touch which with a band for a couple of years 
and they start making smokestack lightning like this !! Don't mind the 
singer at all (not that I really listen to Trower for the vocals). He's 
got a cool bluesy voice that's smooth yet just a little gravelly. This 
thing ROCKS!!! and then "Secret Place" comes along and soothes you like 
a cool summer breeze before Robin resumes opening successive cans of 
guitar whoop-ass until the end of the record. No one plays guitar like 
this anymore. Jimi came first, Stevie Ray is gone. Robin is the last man 
standing. Heavy Blues like no other in the universe just incredible guitar 
work. Soulful, bluesy and rocking

parsed.dn: Robin Trower 20 Century Blues 1994 Studio Album FLAC
parsed.name: Robin Trower 20 Century Blues 1994 Studio Album FLAC
